DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study perform compare two ophthalmic viscosurgical device , DisCoVisc ( hyaluronic acid 1.6 % - chondroitin sulfate 4.0 % ) hydroxypropylmethylcellulose 2 % term overall clinical performance phacoemulsification .
DOC.criteria: Bilateral agerelated cataract Grade 13 lens opacity classification system ( LOCS III ) Pupil dilatation great 7.0 mm Black , brunescent , traumatic subluxate cataract Corneal endothelial disease ( endothelial cell count le 2.000 cells/mm3 ) Glaucoma , uveitis Previous ocular surgery
